column4: hi, I am unable to watch any  videos on-line in Firefox or opera, Ive had this problem for a really long time, noutube, no ted, no nbc; videos on the HDD work properly, I'm running the latest version of ubuntu and its updated. Please help!
if you've installed flashplugin-nonfree and restarted firefox then it *should* work
sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree ought to do it for you
